question: 首班
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>neck</kanji> of the <kanji>squad</kanji> is the most important part of the squad, for if you lose the neck you lose the head (they're all one thing). This person is the <vocabulary>head</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>leader</vocabulary> of a group.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word so it uses the on'yomi readings, which you've learned already. Go you!
